verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H4480>plains<s%> <S%H6160><s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H853><s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H314>utmost<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%>
And the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and the <S%H3603>plain<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and unto <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto thy <S%H2233>seed:<s%> I have caused thee to <S%H7200>see<s%> it with thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in a <S%H1516>valley<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1047>Beth-peor:<s%> but <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> his <S%H6900>sepulcher<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died:<s%> his <S%H5869>eye<s%> was not <S%H3543>dim,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> his natural <S%H3893>force<s%> <S%H5127>abated.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H853>for<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and <S%H60>mourning<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> were <S%H8552>ended.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> was <S%H4392>full<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5564>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And there <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H5750>since<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like unto <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%>

In <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> and the <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land,<s%>

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>showed<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
